de.zabuza.soundEngine

Interface SoundProducer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SamplePlayer

    public interface SoundProducer
    Interface for SoundProducers.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isLive()
      Returns if the sample is still alive.
      float read(float[] buf, int readRate)
      Reads the next sounds in the buffer with a reading rate.
      void skip(int samplesToSkip, int readRate)
      Skips samples with a reading rate.

    • Method Detail

      • isLive

        boolean isLive()
        Returns if the sample is still alive.
        Returns:
        True if sample is alive

      • read

        float read(float[] buf,
         int readRate)
        Reads the next sounds in the buffer with a reading rate.
        Parameters:
        buf - Sound buffer of the sound
        readRate - Reading rate
        Returns:
        Maximal amplitude

      • skip

        void skip(int samplesToSkip,
        int readRate)
        Skips samples with a reading rate.
        Parameters:
        samplesToSkip - Samples to skip
        readRate - Reading rate
